channel.title: DeriveScape V5 Final
channel.description:
[B][SIZE="7"]I KNOW THIS IS SHIT READ THE INFO[/SIZE][/B]
Well, This is the end of the line for DeriveScape. I made it when I had 0 Java skill and I always loved allstar so I decided to keep it. [THIS IS FROM QUITE A LONG TIME AGO] There is a small antileech that can be fixed in server.java
[CENTER][B][SIZE="5"]Pictures[/SIZE][/B] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9av3bq.png[/img]

[URL=http://img42.imageshack.us/i/moledropsinclude.gif/][IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/1235/moledropsinclude.gif[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/7825/javaownz0007.png[/img] Pkpoint requirments: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/jhq729.png[/img]

Client here: [url=http://uppit.com/5cwmuu6psc8i/DeriveScape_client_open.rar]UppIT - Free File hosting - DeriveScape client open.rar[/url] Server here: [url=http://uppit.com/t4xxmce9uozl/DeriveScape_V3_Release.rar]UppIT - Free File hosting - DeriveScape V3 Release.rar[/url] Happy rspsing

item.title: DeriveScape V5 Final
item.dc:creator: @RS_Gamer001 RS Gamer001
item.description:
@RS_Gamer001 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:2, topic:344994”]Below I will list what is wrong with your server(imo)
Looks laggy
Allstar
Under the pk skull it says “Ur good”(should be Your good)
The fact the skull is always on even when there not in the wild…
The fact you try and act cool with the way yours text is
Your ::u
Your forums
Your log in message
Your username is ownage, and yet your not
Should I go on?[/quote]

No, he should replace “Ur Good” with “Safe”!

Read full topic
